pageContext.claim: “And a brand-new poll just shows that 85 percent of blue-collar workers...  believe their lives are headed in the right direction, and the poll numbers are massive.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to one Harris poll that was commissioned by an agency that places workers. The poll found that they are optimistic about their lives but split about whether the country is heading in in the right direction. Plus, in the online poll, there was no way to indicate anything other than being optimistic or "on the wrong track."
